Question: Ænima's final track, "Third Eye" contains samples from this person's Sane Man and Relentless albums.
Hints: This person said he believed it was due to a pro-life commercial aired during a commercial break.
This person was voted "Hot Standup Comic" by Rolling Stone magazine in 1993.
Channel 4 renewed this list in April 2010, which saw this person move up 2 places to #4.
